name: Dr. Zhanbrecher
description:
Play as the kind Dr. Zhanbrecher, and rid the word of disgusting teeth. Be swift and precise with your trusty hammer, avoid unnecessary bloodshed, and make sure your patients never gets holes again. There can be no toothache without teeth.

A fast paced preciscion game about extracting teeth from patients.

Also playable on browser: https://play.unity.com/mg/other/webgl-builds-305680

Because it didn't work on here for some reason
